Posts.Content: Hi All I am looking for advice please I have had pins and needles in both my hands for about 3 weeks now 3 days ago i started with pain in my upper arm (reconstruction arm) The pain has been constant and is getting worse can hardly move my arm at the moment without the pain making me cry out Went to the doctor last week and she thinks the pins and needles is nerve pain But i cant get an appointment at the moment just wondered if anyone else has had this pain Thanks Jane
Posts.Title: Pins and needles

Posts.Content: Hi The doctor did offer me pain relief but a anti depessant and said that i would have to be weaned off it which i refused I had my masectomy in june last year havnt had reconstruction yet . No my feet are not affected Been to see nurse practitioner today and she said the pain in my arm is a pulled muscle Thanks for your comment x
Posts.Title: Pins and needles

Posts.Content: Thankyou all for your comments All the best to each and everyone of you X
Posts.Title: scalp

Posts.Content: Hi all just wondered if anyone uses a scalp shampoo or do they just use the normal stuff  Sorry if this sounds trivial to some I understand people have more important issues  Thanks Jane X
